trans-unit.source: Represents data that is sent with a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa los datos que se envían con un evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started" />.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started> event checks to see if inertia processing is running and if so, stops it.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un controlador de eventos para el <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started> eventos comprueba si el procesamiento de inercia se está ejecutando y si es así, se detiene.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate of the origin.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la coordenada x del origen.

trans-unit.source: The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.
trans-unit.target: El punto de origen representada por la <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginX%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginY%2A> propiedades es la posición media de todos los manipuladores asociada a un elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate of the origin.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la coordenada y del origen.

trans-unit.source: The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.
trans-unit.target: El punto de origen representada por la <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginX%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DStartedEventArgs.OriginY%2A> propiedades es la posición media de todos los manipuladores asociada a un elemento.
